name: Flappy Goat
description: Are you anxious to get your goat on?  Need to lick party goers? Want to soar through the air with a non-aerodynamic jetpack?  Have we got a game for you.  Inspired by the Goat Simulator game, this game features the same silly goat-related antics.  If you haven't played Goat Simulator on Steam, you should get it now, it's hilarious.
